price: Nagsabi [si Khiḍr]: “Tunay na ikaw ay hindi makakakaya sa akin sa pagtitiis.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
